name: Super Z Killer - Zombie survival game
name_original: Super Z Killer - Zombie survival game
description:
Welcome to another massacre, it's time to become a soldier against the zombies.

Kill all zombies on each level, walk around and destroy them!

After killing all zombies, you must looking for the door to escape !

Kill the dead has never been so difficult as now!

Collect coins, ammunition for use in the game, walk using the 360 ​​control on the left and aim and shoot using the 360 ​​control on the right.

Features:

- 3D graphics.
- Zombies with Artificial intelligence.
- More than 1000 levels
